org.grails.datastore.mapping.riak
[Java] Class RiakTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.riak.RiakTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.grails.datastore.mapping.transactions.Transaction
public class RiakTransaction
extends java.lang.Object

A org.grails.datastore.mapping.transactions.Transaction implemenatation for Riak.

Note that this implementation doesn't do any real transaction processing because Riak doesn't have native transaction support.

Authors:
J. Brisbin
